projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.
projects.longDescription: Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Stripe for payments. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, order management, and admin dashboard for inventory control.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.
projects.longDescription: Real-time task management application built with React, Node.js, and Socket.io. Supports team collaboration, task assignments, deadlines, and progress tracking.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A beautiful weather dashboard with location-based forecasts and interactive maps.
projects.longDescription: Weather application with 7-day forecasts, hourly updates, and interactive weather maps. Integrates with multiple weather APIs and provides accurate predictions.
